Texts.Chs: 你是来帮助我们的？很高兴能看到你，我们现在急需援兵。
Texts.Eng: A Protector, you say? Well, that's close enough to being a Guardian...you might not be with SMASH, but we need all the help we can get.

Texts.Chs: 嗯哼，你收到了我们的求救信号？很高兴你能来，我是Zeldia。
Texts.Eng: Hmm. You responded to our distress signal? You certainly don't look like you're from around these parts. My name's Zeldia.

Texts.Chs: 我的一些朋友在那边，或许他们手中会有你需要的东西，如果你看到了他们，请替我向他们问好。
Texts.Eng: Some of my friends are out there, so they might even things out a bit. If you see them, tell them I said hi.

Texts.Chs: 企鹅们占据了这条路，造成了各种混乱。它们数量众多，可能对你来说是个严峻的挑战。
Texts.Eng: The penguins are swarming all over the highway, causing all sorts of chaos. We're heavily outnumbered here, you'll be facing awful odds.

Texts.Chs: 企鹅们可不会仁慈地对待你！我们必须把它们击垮，解救这座城市。
Texts.Eng: The penguins won't show you any mercy, so show them none! We've got to restore order to this city!
